name: fieldset
description: Options for the fieldset component (for example legend).

name: hint
description: Options for the hint component (for example text).

name: errorMessage
description: Options for the error message component. The error message component will not display if you use a falsy value for `errorMessage`, for example `false` or `null`.

name: formGroup
description: Additional options for the form group containing the radios component.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the form group (for example to show error state for the whole group).

name: idPrefix
description: String to prefix id for each radio item if no id is specified on each item. If `idPrefix` is not passed, fallback to using the name attribute instead.

name: name
description: Name attribute for each radio item.

name: value
description: The value for the radio which should be checked when the page loads. Use this as an alternative to setting the `checked` option on each individual item.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each radio item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each radio item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: id
params.description: Specific id attribute for the radio item. If omitted, then `idPrefix` string will be applied.

params.name: hint
params.description: Provide hint to each radio item.

params.name: divider
params.description: Divider text to separate radio items, for example the text `"or"`.

params.name: checked
params.description: If true, radio will be checked.

params.name: conditional
params.description: If true, content provided will be revealed when the item is checked.

params.name: conditional.html
params.description: Provide content for the conditional reveal.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the radio container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the radio input tag.
